jobDescription: Title: Treasury Data Analyst InternshipDate of Internship: Summer 2018Location: Buffalo, NYStatus: Full-time InternshipTo Apply: www.mtb.com/careers then search by: The Opportunity:M&T; Bank is looking for an intern for the summer of 2018. The position, which is paid and based in Buffalo, will give a local college student the chance to work alongside our Treasury Data Analysis team. This position would work on various efforts related to data analysis, data manipulation and business intelligence reporting. While intern projects will vary depending upon need, the intern may have the opportunity to: gain experience with SQL databases, construct extract, transform and load processes, data process documentation, create business intelligence dashboards or other analytical reports. Nature and ScopeInternship hours and duration are flexible. Minimum Qualifications Required:Candidates must be enrolled in a college/university pursuing a bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably pursuing a degree with a focus on Technology, Management Information Systems, Quantitative Finance, Mathematics or related area . Candidates graduating in May 2018 are eligible.Ideal Qualifications Preferred:The ideal candidate: is self-motivated with knowledge of SQL, SAS, Tableau or related language; has strong project planning and management skills; has demonstrated knowledge of the data analytics; has the ability to work independently; strong communication skills; and is familiar with Microsoft Word and Excel.
